title: Can't find scalings in champion pages
body: After they retired the old client the scalings and base damages of champions abilities weren't shown on their pages. Does anyone know why this is or a way to get the scalings back?

replies.body: There was a bug where it was pulling the wrong info/numbers, so they disabled it for now.

The client shows meters for difficulty levels and how they best perform, but I don't recall precise info for stats and sacling per level.  All that goodness should be available on the main [Game Info page](http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/champions/ahri/) though.  I hope that helps!
